availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William N. Gaither (Trigg County, Kentucky, physician and prov govt)

body.p: Kentucky native. Married to Lavinia Anderson Gaither in Trigg County, Kentucky, on February 20, 1844. Father of Nathan Gaither, Mariah Gaither, George E. Gaither, Phillip Gaither. Physician in Trigg County in 1850. Physician in Trigg County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860. Reported as member of convention of the provisional government held at Russellville, Kentucky, in November 1861.
